name: Chicken and Walnut Salad
recipe: Pan roasted pork belly with gratin potato, braised Savoy cabbage, apples, thyme and calvados jus

name: Strobery Milki
recipe: Fill tart crust with pastry cream, arrange fruits on top, and brush with apricot glaze.

name: Veggie Lovers Pizza
recipe: Spread sauce, add mozzarella and mixed veggies. Bake until veggies are tender and crust is crisp.

name: Meat Lovers Pizza
recipe: Spread sauce, add mozzarella and various meats. Bake until meats are cooked through and cheese is melted.

name: Four Cheese Pizza
recipe: Spread sauce, add all four cheeses evenly. Bake until cheese is melted and slightly browned

name: Spinach & Feta Pizza
recipe: Drizzle olive oil, add mozzarella, spinach, and feta. Sprinkle with garlic, bake until spinach is wilted.

recipe: Spread beans on dough, add cheddar and beef. Bake, then top with fresh tomatoes, jalapenos, and garnish with sour cream and lettuce.

recipe: Spread sauce, add mozzarella, ham, and pineapple. Bake until cheese is golden and bubbly.

recipe: Toss lettuce, croutons, and dressing. Garnish with parmesan and pepper.

recipe: Toss greens with beets, goat cheese, and walnuts, drizzle with dressing.

recipe: Toss greens with carrots, almonds, and oranges, add sesame dressing.

recipe: Melt  butter, mix with sugar, eggs, flour, and vanilla but the center is gooey

name: Tiramisu
recipe: Layer espresso-soaked ladyfingers with mascarpone mixture, top with cocoa powder. Chill before serving.

name: storyberry cake
recipe: Mix cream with egg yolks and sugar, bake in ramekins. Chill, then torch sugar on top to caramelize.

name: Cheesecake
recipe: Blend cream cheese with sugar, eggs, and vanilla. Pour over crust, bake until set. Chill before serving.

name: Minestrone Soup
recipe: Sauté veggies, add tomatoes and broth. Simmer, add beans and pasta, cook until pasta is tender. Stir in spinach

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipe: Sauté vegetables, add chicken and broth, simmer. Add noodles and cook until tender.

name: Butternut Squash Soup
recipe: Roast squash, sauté onion and garlic, add squash and broth. Blend until smooth, stir in cream and cinnamon.

name: Clam Chowder
recipe: Sauté bacon, then add celery and onion. Add potatoes, clams, and clam juice, simmer. Stir in cream to finish.

name: Broccoli Cheddar Soup
recipe: Sauté onions, add broccoli  Add broth and simmer. Stir in cheese and milk until creamy.

name: Cream of Mushroom Soup
recipe: Sauté mushrooms, onions, and garlic. Add broth and simmer, blend until smooth, stir in cream..

name: Lentil Soup
recipe: Sauté mushrooms, onions, and garlic. Add broth and simmer, blend until smooth, stir in cream.

name: Classic Lemonade
recipe: Juice lemons, mix with sugar and water until dissolved. Serve over ice with mint..

name: Ginger Lemon Fizz
recipe: Muddle ginger, add lemon juice, soda water, and honey. Serve over ice.

name: Virgin Mojito
recipe: Muddle mint and sugar, add lime juice, soda water, and ice. Stir gently.

name: Malta Juice
recipe: Muddle mint and sugar, add lime juice, soda water, and ice. Stir gently.
